Summary: Citizens Financial Group (CFG) analyzed 1 bill with 1 direct and 4 indirect impacts. Faces 1% tax increase. Overall risk: low direct, moderate indirect exposure.
SummaryKeypoints: H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes 1% tax. affecting operations in United States. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "There is hereby imposed on any remittance transfer a tax equal to 1 percent of the amount of such transfer."

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act affects supplier Fiserv (United States) through tax The legislation specifies: "There is hereby imposed on any remittance transfer a tax equal to 1 percent of the amount of such transfer."

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act affects supplier FIS (United States) through tax The legislation specifies: "There is hereby imposed on any remittance transfer a tax equal to 1 percent of the amount of such transfer."

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act affects supplier PayPal (United States) through tax The legislation specifies: "There is hereby imposed on any remittance transfer a tax equal to 1 percent of the amount of such transfer."
